| --------------------- | --------- | ----------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |

## Events

| Event              | Description                                                               | Type                  |
| ------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------- |
| `smartCellDidLoad` | Fired when the component and all its child did render for the first time. | `CustomEvent<string>` |
